message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I believe this product holds significantly more value.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,250,000?
I appreciate the effort to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to consider $1,220,000?
